com.zebra.sdk.zxp.settings

Interface SettingsHelperUtilZxp


  • public interface SettingsHelperUtilZxp
    Provides device settings convenience methods for ZXP Series printers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ATMMode getATMMode()
      Returns the ATM card feed mode.
      ParameterInfo getEndCardOffset()
      Returns the printer's end of print value.
      ParameterInfo getHeadResistance()
      Returns the print head resistance value and valid range.
      MagneticEncoderOffsetInfo getMagneticEncoderOffsets()
      Returns the magnetic encoder offset values.
      ParameterInfo getMonochromeBias()
      Returns the monochrome bias value.
      NetworkInfo getNetworkParameters()
      Returns a printer's current network parameters.
      ParameterInfo getXOffset(CardSide side)
      Returns the x-offset for the specified card side.
      ParameterInfo getYOffset(CardSide side)
      Returns the y-offset for the specified card side.
      boolean isCardPrefeed()
      Returns the card pre-feed enabled state.
      void setATMMode(ATMMode mode)
      Sets the ATM card feed mode.
      void setCardPrefeed(boolean enable)
      Sets the card pre-feed enabled state.
      void setEndCardOffset(int offset)
      Sets the printer's end of print value.
      void setMonochromeBias(int bias)
      Sets the monochrome bias value.
      void setXOffset(CardSide side, int offset)
      Sets the X offset for the specified side of the card.
      void setYOffset(CardSide side, int offset)
      Sets the y-offset for the specified card side.

    • Method Detail

      • getATMMode

        ATMMode getATMMode()
                   throws ConnectionException,
                          SettingsException
        Returns the ATM card feed mode.
        Returns:
        the card feeder source.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the ATM card feed mode.

      • getEndCardOffset

        ParameterInfo getEndCardOffset()
                               throws ConnectionException,
                                      SettingsException
        Returns the printer's end of print value.
        Returns:
        instance containing the ec-offset value and range limits.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the end car offset.

      • getMonochromeBias

        ParameterInfo getMonochromeBias()
                                throws ConnectionException,
                                       SettingsException
        Returns the monochrome bias value.
        Returns:
        instance containing the monochrome bias value and range limits.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the monochrome bias value.

      • getXOffset

        ParameterInfo getXOffset(CardSide side)
                         throws ConnectionException,
                                SettingsException
        Returns the x-offset for the specified card side.
        Parameters:
        side - side of card.
        Returns:
        instance containing the x-offset value and range limits.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the x-offset.

      • getYOffset

        ParameterInfo getYOffset(CardSide side)
                         throws ConnectionException,
                                SettingsException
        Returns the y-offset for the specified card side.
        Parameters:
        side - side of card.
        Returns:
        instance containing the y-offset value and range limits.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the y-offset.

      • isCardPrefeed

        boolean isCardPrefeed()
                      throws ConnectionException,
                             SettingsException
        Returns the card pre-feed enabled state.
        Returns:
        true if the pre-feed state is enabled.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the card pre-feed state.

      • setATMMode

        void setATMMode(ATMMode mode)
                throws SettingsException
        Sets the ATM card feed mode.
        Parameters:
        mode - the card feeder source.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the ATM card feed mode, the device is busy, a printer error, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • setCardPrefeed

        void setCardPrefeed(boolean enable)
                    throws SettingsException
        Sets the card pre-feed enabled state.
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the pre-feed state, the device is busy, a printer error, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • setEndCardOffset

        void setEndCardOffset(int offset)
                      throws SettingsException
        Sets the printer's end of print value.
        Parameters:
        offset - end of print offset value.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the end of print value, the device is busy, a printer error, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • setMonochromeBias

        void setMonochromeBias(int bias)
                       throws SettingsException
        Sets the monochrome bias value.
        Parameters:
        bias - the offset value to be applied to monochrome printing.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the monochrome bias value, the device is busy, a printer error, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • setXOffset

        void setXOffset(CardSide side,
              int offset)
                throws SettingsException
        Sets the X offset for the specified side of the card.
        Parameters:
        side - side of card.
        offset - the y-offset value for the specified card side.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the x-offset, the device is busy, a printer error, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • setYOffset

        void setYOffset(CardSide side,
              int offset)
                throws SettingsException
        Sets the y-offset for the specified card side.
        Parameters:
        side - side of card.
        offset - the y-offset value for the specified card side.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the y-offset, the device is busy, a printer error, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • getNetworkParameters

        NetworkInfo getNetworkParameters()
                                 throws SettingsException
        Returns a printer's current network parameters.
        Returns:
        the printer's wired network configuration.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the network parameters, the device is busy, a printer error, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • getHeadResistance

        ParameterInfo getHeadResistance()
                                throws ConnectionException,
                                       SettingsException
        Returns the print head resistance value and valid range.
        Returns:
        information about the print head resistance value and range.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the head resistance.

      • getMagneticEncoderOffsets

        MagneticEncoderOffsetInfo getMagneticEncoderOffsets()
                                                    throws ConnectionException,
                                                           SettingsException,
                                                           ZebraCardException
        Returns the magnetic encoder offset values.
        Returns:
        the magnetic encoder offset values.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the magnetic encoder offsets.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.
